titles.title: A concurrent resolution authorizing printing of the House of Representatives Election Law Guidebook, 1988.

action.text: Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.
Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on Rules.
Senate Committee on Rules discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 5/10/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the printing of the House of Representatives Election Law Guidebook, 1988 as a House document. Provides for the printing of additional copies for the use of the Committee on House Administration.
